alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Routt and northeastern Moffat Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Savery, or 31 miles north of Craig, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Routt and northeastern Moffat Counties, including the following locations... Slater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains
